page.title: 06Youth Club
page.content: Youth Club is on Tuesdays at St.Andrew's Church Hall and on Fridays at St.John's Church Hall. We play games and we can buy sweets. We go on trips to different places like Alton Towers, Bristol ice rink, the River Teign, Pontins Holiday camp, St.Agnes, Kitson park, Totnes Youth Club, Barton Hall and we go on hikes at the River Dart Country Park. We pay a sub. of 20p. Discos and Break dancing competitions are organised. About 50 people go to the club and their ages are from 9 to 14 years old. I like the club a lot and I hope that it will carry on running throughout the year.
